title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. The set comes pre-lit with 100 warm LED lights that will add a cozy glow to your holiday decor.

Crafted from sturdy, high-quality materials, this wreath and garland set is hypoallergenic and fireproof for added peace of mind. With no assembly required and no need for water, this set is low maintenance and will never fade. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, you can place it on your wall, door, fireplace, living room, bedroom, dining room, or windows.

Plus, with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability, you can trust in the quality and durability of this festive set. Don't miss out on the perfect addition to your Christmas decorations this holiday season!

The 100 warm LED lights add a cozy glow to your indoor or outdoor Christmas decorations. With high-quality materials, hypoallergenic features, and fireproof pins, this set is both sturdy and safe.
